site_name: Fomer 39A-B, 41, 43-47 Dudden Hill Lane & car park Villiers Road R/O 43-47, London, NW10
description: Non-material amendments to allow the replacement of 4th, 5th and roof plan as well as elevation in line with the latest design. These variations are: 1. Material of the sprinklers tank has been confirmed by the specialist to be a GR cellular tank and pump room and tank and pump room sizes amended and slightly relocated in line with specialist design. 2. Cat ladder included in the elevations in line with the Access and maintenance strategy. 3. Additional AOVs in roof as requested by London Fire Brigade and in coordination with Building Control 4. Louvres sizes amended to latest MEP design 5. Key clamp included in the elevations in line with the Access and maintenance strategy.in reference to Variation of Conditions reference 21/4604 dated 12 September 2022, for Variation of conditions 2 (development built in accordance to approved drawings) of Deemed (Reg4 Councils Other Development) reference 19/1095 dated 17 October 2019, for Demolition of existing buildings and erection of a part 4 storey, part 5 storey building with Learie Constantine community centre (Use Class D1) on ground floor and 26 self-contained flats above (12 x 1 Bed, 7 x 2 Bed and 7 x 3 bed), provision for balcony amenity, and associated landscaping.(amended)
